attributes.action: Make recreational cannabis completely legal by the start of 2020 for anyone 18+
attributes.additional_details: The main argument against legalisation is that the new super strength ‘skunk’ weed, available in the UK, potentially causes mental health problems. Therefore I have found a brilliant solution to stop the weed from hell melting the minds of our kindred. Just don’t produce/distribute skunk weed! If cannabis is legalised the government can control it. They will grow it, sell it and tax it. So if the government don’t want skunk weed, don’t grow skunk weed. Instead only grow natural safe cannabis.
attributes.background: The laws on cannabis are changing all over the world and I think most people agree that eventually the UK will follow. So why wait? By setting a time limit it forces the government to act. It’s time for change, it’s time for legalisation.
